casebody.data:
NORTZ v. MILLER, Alien Property Custodian, et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit November 24, 1922.) No. 86. Paul C. Schnitzler, of New York City, for appellant. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City, Adna R. Johnson, Jr., and Dean H. Stanley, Sp. Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellees.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges,

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
